<font size="6">刚刚发现的新活动，时间有限，速度来领</font><br>
<font size="6">打开天翼云盘APP，点右下角我的，再进入活动中心</font><br>
<font size="6"><img id="aimg_kb7oo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkms5n.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkms5n.jpg"></font><br>
<font size="6"><br>
</font><br>
<font size="6">进入金蛇献瑞这个活动</font><br>
<font size="6"><img id="aimg_OGpJF" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmc80.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmc80.jpg"></font><br>
<font size="6">进入活动界面，点生成我的专属大片，按照提示一步步操作完成</font><br>
<font size="6"><img id="aimg_pd52Y" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmqxK.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmqxK.jpg"></font><br>
<font size="6">生成完成后会有短信息通知，收到短信息后，在活动界面那个美女照片右上角，点一下领会员的红包，一会就收到会员开通提示了</font><br>
<font size="6"><img id="aimg_e5M42" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmxVH.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/01/18/pEkmxVH.jpg"></font><br>
<font size="6">进入客户端，可以看到会员已经开通</font><br>
